item.description:
Join us for food, drinks and a raffle. Proceeds raised at this event will go to fund food, transportation and any activity fees incurred on future trips with Boston area youth.
Door donation is $15 (non-tax-deductible contribution)

Sierra Club's Inner City Outing Program brings urban youth out into the natural environment. Since 1994, we’ve been planning, organizing and leading trips year-round to natural areas in Massachusetts and throughout the northeast. Some of our most common adventures include:

· Maple sugaring, nature walks and photography in the spring;

· Canoeing, kayaking, swimming, biking, berry picking and sailing in the summer;...

· Camping, hiking, apple picking, and farm visits in the fall; and

· Snowshoeing, sledding, skating, and cross country skiing in the winter.

Every two years, we ask your support, by attending our fundraiser and buying raffle tickets.

RSVPs not necessary

Find More information at our website:
http://bostonico.org/...

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Inner City Outings Program Bi-Annual Winter Fundraiser!
